name: Ampharos
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a basic Energy card attached to 1 of your Benched Pokemon to your Active Pokemon. This power can't be used if Ampharos is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: You may discard all Lightning Energy attached to Ampharos. If you do, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Confused.

name: Ariados
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 30 more damage for each Special Condition affecting the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep and Poisoned. Before applying this effect, you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with 1 of the Defending Pokemon. If you do, the new Defending Pokemon is now Asleep and Poisoned. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokemon to switch.

name: Bellossom
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Grass Pokemon, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. If you put any Grass Pokemon into your hand, you may switch Bellossom with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If you have at least 3 Bellossom in play, this attack does 50 damage plus 50 more damage.

name: Feraligatr
AbilityText: As long as Feraligatr is your Active Pokemon, any damage done by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: If your opponent has 5 of more cards in his or her hand, your opponent discards a number of cards until your opponent has 4 cards left in his or her hand.
Attack2Text: You may do 50 damage plus 30 more damage. If you do, Feraligatr does 30 damage to itself.

name: Flareon
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If Flareon has 3 or more different types of basic Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Forretress
Attack1Text: Put 3 damage counters on the Defending Pokemon at the end of your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Put 7 damage counters on Forretress. Move all Energy cards attached to Forretress to your Benched Pokemon in any way you like. (Ignore this effect if you don't have any Benched Pokemon.)

name: Houndoom
AbilityText: As long as you have less Pokemon in play than your opponent, your opponent can't play any Trainer cards (except for Supporter cards) from his or her hand.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Houndoom.

name: Jolteon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: If Jolteon has 3 of more different types of basic Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Meganium
AbilityText: As long as Meganium is your Active Pokemon, remove 1 damage counter from each Pokemon (excluding Pokemon-ex) (both yours and your opponent's) between turns.
Attack1Text: You may put up to 5 damage counters on Meganium. If you do, this attack does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter you put on Meganium in this way.

name: Octillery
AbilityText: As long as Octillery is your Active Pokemon, your opponent's Pokemon can't retreat.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy card attached to Octillery. During your next turn, Octillery's Pulse Blast attack's base damage is 120.

name: Poliwrath
AbilityText: If Poliwrath is your Active Pokemon and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, the Attacking Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is a Darkness Pokemon or has Dark in its name, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is a Stage 2 Evolved Pokemon, this attack does 60 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Porygon2
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), return a Pokemon Tool card attached to 1 of your Pokemon to your hand. This power can't be used if Porygon2 is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If you have less than 8 cards in your hand, draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand.
Attack2Text: If Porygon2 has a Scramble Energy card attached to it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Slowbro
AbilityText: As long as Slowbro has any Psychic Energy attached to it, Slowbro is both Water and Psychic type.
Attack1Text: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokemon (including Slowbro).

name: Slowking
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Pokemon Tool card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Pokemon Tool card in your discard pile. You can't add more than 60 damage in this way.

name: Sudowoodo
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. Copy copies that attack. This attack does nothing if Sudowoodo doesn't have the Energy necessary to use that attack. (You must still do anything else required for that attack.) Sudowoodo performs that attack.
Attack2Text: Does 50 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Sudowoodo.

name: Sunflora
Attack1Text: Each Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Grass Energy attached to all of your Pokemon.

name: Typhlosion
AbilityText: As long as Typhlosion is your Active Pokemon, put 1 damage counter on each Active Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's) between turns.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Typhlosion.

name: Ursaring
AbilityText: As long as Ursaring is your Active Pokemon, your opponent's Basic Pokemon can't attack or use any Poke-Powers.
Attack1Text: Before doing damage, you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with the Defending Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 20 damage to the new Defending Pokemon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokemon to switch.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Vaporeon
Attack1Text: You may attach a basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If Vaporeon has 3 or more different types of basic Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Chansey
Attack1Text: Remove 1 damage counter and all Special Conditions from each of your Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to each Defending Pokemon.

name: Cleffa
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Clefairy from your hand onto Cleffa (this counts as evolving Cleffa) and remove all damage counters from Cleffa.
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw 6 cards.

name: Electabuzz
AbilityText: As long as Electabuzz is an Evolved Pokemon, any damage done to Electabuzz by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon that has any Special Energy cards attached to it is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads. If either of the coins is heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Discard 3 Energy attached to Electabuzz.

name: Elekid
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Electabuzz from your hand onto Elekid (this counts as evolving Elekid) and remove all damage counters from Elekid.
Attack1Text: If Low Pressure System is in play, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Hitmonchan
AbilityText: As long as Hitmonchan is an Evolved Pokemon, Hitmonchan gets +30 HP.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the number of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Hitmonlee
AbilityText: As long as Hitmonlee is an Evolved Pokemon, Hitmonlee's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Hitmontop
AbilityText: As long as Hitmontop is an Evolved Pokemon, is your Active Pokemon, and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Hitmontop is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has at least 2 damage counters on it, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Ho-Oh
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 60 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Jynx
AbilityText: As long as Jynx is an Evolved Pokemon, prevent all effects of opponent's attacks, except damage, done to Jynx, and Jynx has no Weakness.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Put 4 damage counters on your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Lugia
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Murkrow
Attack1Text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with 1 of the Defending Pokemon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokemon to switch. The new Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Before doing damage, discard all Trainer cards attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Smoochum
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Jynx from your hand onto Smoochum (this counts as evolving Smoochum) and remove all damage counters from Smoochum.
Attack1Text: Put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Stantler
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is an Evolved Pokemon, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Look at your opponent's hand, choose a Trainer card you find there, and discard it.

name: Tyrogue
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Hitmonlee, Hitmonchan, or Hitmontop from your hand onto Tyrogue (this counts as evolving Tyrogue) and remove all damage counters from Tyrogue.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the number of Pokemon in play your opponent has more than you.

name: Aipom
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Aipom is on your Bench, you may draw a card. Then, discard all cards attached to Aipom and put Aipom on the bottom of your deck. You can't use more than 1 Snappy Move Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Bayleef
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Clefable
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: During your next turn, Extra Comet Punch does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Corsola
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Water or Fighting Pokemon (excluding Pokemon-ex), show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Croconaw
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Granbull
AbilityText: As long as Granbull is your Active Pokemon, any damage done by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Lanturn
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to Lanturn.
Attack2Text: Lanturn does 10 damage to itself.

name: Magcargo
AbilityText: As long as Magcargo has any Fighting Energy attached to it, Magcargo is both Fire and Fighting type.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Pokemon-ex, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Miltank
AbilityText: Any damage done to Miltank by attacks from Fire Pokemon and Water Pokemon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Noctowl
Attack1Text: Draw 3 cards.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

name: Quagsire
AbilityText: Any damage done to Quagsire by attacks from your opponent's Evolved Pokemon is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Quilava
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Scyther
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 in any combination of Scyther and Scyther ex and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Scyther during your opponent's next turn.

name: Shuckle
AbilityText: Prevent all damage done to Shuckle by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon-ex.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokemon between turns.

name: Smeargle
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a basic Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon (excluding Pokemon-ex). If you do, search your discard pile for a basic Energy card (excluding the one you discarded) and attach it to that Pokemon. This power can't be used if Smeargle is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Xatu
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Yanma
Attack1Text: Draw 2 cards. You may switch Yanma with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Chinchou
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Clefairy
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Cyndaquil
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy card attached to Cyndaquil.

name: Eevee
AbilityText: Whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to Eevee, you may search your deck for a card that evolves from Eevee that is the same type as the Energy card you attached to Eevee. Put that card onto Eevee. (This counts as evolving Eevee.) Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used when you attach an Energy card to Eevee as part of an attack's effect.

name: Flaaffy
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flaaffy does 10 damage to itself.

name: Gligar
AbilityText: If Gligar has no Energy cards attached to it, Gligar's Retreat Cost is 0.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Gloom
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Hoothoot
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Houndour
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Larvitar
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Larvitar.

name: Natu
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Oddish
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Onix
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for an Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

name: Poliwag
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Poliwhirl
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Poliwhirl but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

name: Porygon
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Remoraid
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Slowpoke
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Basic Pokemon, Evolution card, or basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Slugma
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Snubbull
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Spinarak
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

name: Sunkern
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Teddiursa
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Teddiursa by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Totodile
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Unown
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Unown and switch it with Unown. (Any cards attached to Unown, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) If you do, put Unown on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Shuffle Poke-Power each turn.

name: Unown
